department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
short_summary: Purchase of fresh fruit and vegetables in Quebec.
description: The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC), on behalf of Fisheries and Oceans Canada, Correctional Service of Canada, and Department of National Defense, is seeking to purchase fresh fruits and vegetables located in Quebec. All necessary documentation and bid submissions are due by 2 PM EST on January 10, 2024. Bids received after this deadline will be considered non-responsive. The tender description is provided in Annex A of the attached documents.
full_summary:
# Request for Standing Offer: E6MON-23PQFL- Period 08 - RMSO Fresh Fruits and Vegetables

### Title Information
*   **English Title**: E6MON-23PQFL - Period 08 - RMSO Fresh Fruits and Vegetables
*   **French Title**: E6MON-23PQFL - Période 08 - OCPR Fruits et Légumes Frais

### Solicitation Information
*   **Solicitation Reference Number**: WS3971410438
*   **Amendment Number**: 0
*   **Publication Date**: 2023-12-08
*   **Tender Closing Date**: 2024-01-10, 14:00:00 (EST)

### Contract Information
*   **Procurement Category**: Goods and Services (GD)
*   **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open bidding
*   **Notice Type**: Request for Standing Offer (Demande d'offre à commandes)

### Requirements and Specifications
*   **End Time for Bid**: 2:00 PM EST on January 10th, 2024
*   **Location**: Quebec (except National Capital Region)
*   **UNSpsc Codes**: 50300000 (Fresh fruits), 50400000 (Fresh vegetables)
*   **Trade Agreements**: Several international trade agreements, including Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement, Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement, and others.

### Contracting Entity
*   **Contracting Entity Name**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
*   **Address**: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5, Canada

### Contact Information
*   **Name**: Selina Ly
*   **Email**: [selina.ly@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:selina.ly@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
*   **Notice SharePoint URL**: [https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18230703?extsite=MTgyMzA3MDNfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18230703?extsite=MTgyMzA3MDNfQU4wMTQ4
